name: Honey War
description:
Story: Your bees are hungry and the honey is running out. And that isn't the biggest problem: You are attacked by nasty wasps, which want to steal your last drops of honey. Protect your nest and defeat the wasps!

Controls and Goal: Move the queen and her warrior bees with your mousepointer and kill the wasps by touching them. You have to protect your nest for 2 minutes. If you miss a wasp and it touches your nest, you'll lose 5 honey drops. But don't worry your 6 worker bees will collect honey from the flowers.

Made for the 48 LezGameJam#1
